DOC.criteria: 1 13 year age Currently tolerate enteral feeding Has enteral access Requires enteral tube feed provide 90 % nutritional need ( without use modular ( ) ) least 9 day Having obtain his/her and/or his/her legal representative 's informed consent Condition contraindicate enteral feeding ( i.e . intestinal obstruction ) Lack enteral access Any condition would contraindicate use study product ( i.e . need severe fluid restriction , cow 's milk protein allergy , ) Judged risk poor compliance study protocol Lack informed consent Currently participate another conflict clinical trial
